description: Try our easy to follow Corned Beef With Sweet Mustard Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Corned Beef With Sweet Mustard Sauce
name: Corned Beef With Sweet Mustard Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from cooking liquid and slice. Serve with carrots and potatoes; with mustard sauce to the side. Garnish with parsley, if using. Tip 1: Do not boil the meat or it will become stringy and dry. Adjust the heat throughout the cooking process so that it is a gently simmering. Tip 2: As a guide corned beef takes about 20 minutes per 500g. Tip 3: Allow the meat to stand in the cooking liquid for about 15 minutes once off the heat. This will keep it from drying out while making the sauce.
